com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Interface RecoverableDatabaseOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecoverableDatabaseOperationsImpl

    public interface RecoverableDatabaseOperations
    Contains operations for getting Azure SQL Databases that can be recovered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RecoverableDatabaseGetResponse get(String serverName, String databaseName)
      Returns information about a recoverable Azure SQL Database.
      Future<RecoverableDatabaseGetResponse> getAsync(String serverName, String databaseName)
      Returns information about a recoverable Azure SQL Database.
      RecoverableDatabaseListResponse list(String serverName)
      Returns a collection of databases that can be recovered from a specified server.
      Future<RecoverableDatabaseListResponse> listAsync(String serverName)
      Returns a collection of databases that can be recovered from a specified server.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        RecoverableDatabaseGetResponse get(String serverName,
                                   String databaseName)
                            throws IOException,
                                   ServiceException,
                                   ParserConfigurationException,
                                   SAXException
        Returns information about a recoverable Azure SQL Database.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the database was hosted.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the recoverable Azure SQL Database to be obtained.
        Returns:
        Contains the response to the Get Recoverable Database request.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.

      • getAsync

        Future<RecoverableDatabaseGetResponse> getAsync(String serverName,
                                                String databaseName)
        Returns information about a recoverable Azure SQL Database.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the database was hosted.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the recoverable Azure SQL Database to be obtained.
        Returns:
        Contains the response to the Get Recoverable Database request.

      • list

        RecoverableDatabaseListResponse list(String serverName)
                              throws IOException,
                                     ServiceException,
                                     ParserConfigurationException,
                                     SAXException
        Returns a collection of databases that can be recovered from a specified server.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the databases were hosted.
        Returns:
        Contains the response to the List Recoverable Databases request.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.

      • listAsync

        Future<RecoverableDatabaseListResponse> listAsync(String serverName)
        Returns a collection of databases that can be recovered from a specified server.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the databases were hosted.
        Returns:
        Contains the response to the List Recoverable Databases request.
